attributes.action: Send all islamic extremists out of UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need to think of our future generation and security in the UK. There is only one risk that is Islamic extremists. They are influencing the muslim community to be radical. They also express such a message that may cause massive dissaster in the UK. For example religious riots as they say in public that ''we will conquer UK, Europe, USA and shariah law will be implemented in UK and all over the world''.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
